Manager Response: Dear Gail M,   Thank you for your lovely review! Kudos to Michael for making your stay unforgettable! We truly hope to serve you again in the not so far future.

Summary: Getting ready to make a cross country move, the house was empty so we stayed here before we started early the next morning. It was very comfortable & spacious. The bed was very comfortable and the pillows were great! Got a good nights sleep and a reasonable breakfast. The parking is very tight and if your driving a motor home or something big you may find it a challenge. Otherwise a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Zain D,  Thank you for taking the time in writing us a review. I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and our amenities we offer. Our pillows are brand new and i'm glad you enjoyed them.  Thank you again,

Summary: I stayed 4 nights - too long. The room was decent - clean, spacious, comfy bed. However the walls (and ceiling!) were thin and I was right next to the cleaner‚Äôs closet and the laundry was upstairs. Not only did I hear the doors slamming, and people going in and out, but the carts rolling in and out - ugh! I smelled an irony smell which I thought could be the new carpet, then maybe the air conditioner, but the last day I realized it was the chemicals from the laundry room upstairs. My recommendation if you choose this hotel would be to ask for an upstairs room closer to the pool.   I will add that the staff was fabulous - very helpful and friendly, and I liked the snacks they had available for purchase in the lobby and OH - yummy free cookies! Breakfast was also very good - eggs,
Manager Response: Hi Judy F,  Thank you for the candid feedback from your recent stay. While I am glad to know that you liked our staff and enjoyed our breakfast, I was quite concerned that you had some problems with the lack of sound insulation in our rooms as well as the smell. I know this was inconvenient for you and I am sorry. I will share your comments with our team to help us improve in our services and accommodation.  Again, thank you for the review and for staying with us. I hope that we would have another chance to accommodate you again in the future.   Mike F.  Case Manager  IHGService

Summary Heading: Acceptable hotel but nothing to write home about
Summary: This hotel was completely acceptable, but it is getting a little worn around the edges. Would recommend asking for a room away from the highway, which runs right in front of the hotel. I am an IHG platinum level member, but no room upgrade was available.
Manager Response: Hi BP2005,  It's a pleasure to hear from a loyal Platinum Elite. Thanks for staying with us. I hope next time we can provide you an upgrade. I'm sorry for the letdown. As you know, it's subject to availability on arrival. I appreciate you sharing your thoughts on areas where we can improve, particularly with soundproofing and some visible signs of wear and tear. The hotel will have your comments in mind for future enhancements.  We look forward to your return!  Best,  Anna R Case Manager IHGService

Summary: We had an upgrade to a suite. It was a lovely room, so comfortable. It had everything you needed in the room. We did not find the entrance tricky at all. Everything was clean and spotless. Staff friendly and pleasant. Close to the freeway, a small local shop close by, Only one small thing the breakfast room was a bit small. Most people took theirs back to their room If we go back to Costa Mesa again we will stay there.   Plenty of choice at breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Worldtripper2001,  Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Express & Suites. It was a pleasure to have you in our property. We truly hope to serve you again in the not so far future. I'm sorry to hear that the breakfast area was uncomfortable due to the lack of space. Your feedback is extremely important to us because it helps us make a better experience for our guest.

Summary: So the moment I arrived into this tricky entrance and parked, I walked in and was welcomed by Joe -- tough accent and all business, kind of prickly. But there was Mike, making Otis Spunkmeyers. Gave me four cookies and was the kindest, nicest soul I have ever met at a Holiday Inn. He even brought my wife and I cleaning supplies after we bought a used Samsonite carryon at a thrift store (we were buying too many things). This guy is great. Mike seems to be there all the time and we appreciated running into him. The room was smallish, we didn't get an upgrade even with our status. Traffic is busy (it's Southern California) and it is a one-way road out there. We were in the underground parking and it can get smelly with the exhaust. A bit further from the beach, but less expensive.
Manager Response: Dear DermDude1,  Thank you for taking the time in writing us a review. I appreciate your feedback and will be glad to share this wonderful review with Mike. We hope to see you again soon!  Thank you,

Summary: The hotel was perfect, clean and fresh, the linen in the beds extremely comfortable, all the housekeepers so kind but the supervisor Betty was the best of the best, so helpful in all my request and also she made my stay feeling great with her great smile, if i could give her 20 stars definitely I would do it.
Manager Response: Dear Oliver F,  Thank you for your review.  Thank you,

Summary Heading: Clean and comfortable at a Excellent value
Summary: Although we stayed just one night this place was Clean and staff was very polite and professional.. Our room was clean and the bed was AMAZING.. felt like you were laying in a cloud! So comfortable.. Great choice on the beds HIE.. Entrance is different than most hotels not sure if it is a good or bad thing.. Parking spaces seemed a little narrow(in the garage at least) but were no charge.. Just minutes away from the O.C. fair grounds and within walking distance to a few restaurants nearby.. I could myself staying here again
Manager Response: Hello Sean F,  Thanks for choosing Holiday Inn Express Costa Mesa for your lodging needs and for leaving us feedback.  I'm happy that you enjoyed the quality of our beds and the cleanliness of our hotel. Also, the staff is happy to see your compliments. These types of reviews keep us motivated to be on top of our game. But, I'm sorry to know about your dismay regarding the condition of our parking area. I understand that we still need to improve on this. I am taking your feedback seriously and shared this with the management of the hotel so we can further improve our services. I am confident that the necessary steps will be made to avoid the same inconvenience in the future.  I truly hope that we will have a chance to make it up to you and provide you with a better experience upon your return, Sean F!  All the best,  Peter J. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: This is an overrated hotel. Average at best. An older, dated property. Parking is inadequate and difficult. Very small pool. No hot tub. My bed sagged. The TV remote had several buttons that didn't work. Maintenance man said they didn't have any new remotes to replace it. Room was small. Overlooked a low-income apartment house next door that was a former motel. Room was next to the laundry room, which isn't a good location. Internet was slow. Needed new carpet. AC was weak. Elevator very slow. Clerk let me looked at another room, but it smelled bad so I stayed put. Clerk was unfriendly. I had wanted to stay a second night, during the week, but they wouldn't give me the same rate I had and quoted a much higher one. So I moved to a different motel. Costa Mesa isn't the best place
Manager Response: Hi Les G,  Thank you for the review. I was concerned to see that you were not impressed with our property particularly with our rooms, parking, and our amenities just to name a few. I know this must have been frustrating and I am sorry. I'll share your comments with our team for necessary improvements.  Again, thank you for the review and for staying with us. I hope that we would have another chance to provide you a better experience next time.  Regards,   Mike F.  Case Manager  IHGService

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable, great staff and excellent value
Summary: We had reservations for 3 nights and ended up staying for 5 nights. The bed, sheets and pillows were more comfortable than some 4-stars we've stayed. Room was recently renovated and spotless. Breakfast (included) had healthy options and coffee was great. Most importantly, staff were all fantastic, especially Andrew and Nancy at the front desk.   We appreciate that the HIE doesn't charge for parking and we always found a space. Location is very close to the beach, mall and great restaurants and bars. Excellent Mexican food in the area (Taco Mesa for casual and Taco Maria for fine dining). Freeway traffic dies down at night so the hotel is quiet for a good night's rest.  Highly recommended for an easy and comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Dear TMicahT9,  Thank you for taking the time in writing us a review. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Andrew and I are very thankful for your kind words. We hope to see you again soon!  Thank you,

Summary Heading: Good, could use work to get closer to great
Summary: Entrance is strange and difficult, parking underground and walking up exterior ramp with luggage is inconvenient.  Elevator went out during our stay, but luckily we were on the 2nd floor, not that many stairs.  Not sure what was above room 205, but stomping, running, and loud bumps made for a horrible nights rest.  Staff was professional and pleasant and overall do a great job!  I wanted to give this property higher markings but simply cannot ignore the shortcomings.  The gym is on the 3rd floor but not sure if it was that or not that woke me in the middle of the night multiple times and into the morning.  The bedding was adequate and clean.  The room was as well.  The price was in line with the brand and made this an attractive choice but its doubtful I'll make the same
Manager Response: Dear Mike G,  Thank you for taking the time in writing us a review. I'm sorry to hear that your stay was not up to par. We have taken your feedback and have made some improvements. Our elevator is now up and running. Thank you again for your valuable feedback and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you,

Summary: the hotel was clean.  the area close to the freeway and not so nice.  we stayed as we had a grandchild at Hoag.  Yard house about a mile and is excellent for happy hour.  Price was right $119.99 booked directly with Holiday Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time in writing us a review. I'm glad you enjoyed your stay and the thing around the area. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Checked in and was met by a young man who didn‚Äôt seem to know how to use the credit card machine. I am an IHG member (premier elite) and was told my IHG credit card was no good. I was forced to use another credit card that is not on file with IHG. We then parked in the garage and attempted to use the elevator, only to find it full of boxes and we were not able to fit in. After 10-15 minutes, the staff finally made room for us to fit beside the boxes so we did not have to take the stairs to the 3rd floor. Room was very nice and clean, but the old single pane windows make it very noisy
Manager Response: Dear RIP F,  Thank you for taking the time in writing us a review. I'm sorry to hear that your stay was not up to par. We hope to be able to serve you in the future and make things right. Thank you again for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Good, But Far from Great! Average at Best!
Summary: We stayed here recently. The location is a short distance away from the expensive Newport Beach water front locations. Free under ground parking. but it‚Äôs tight and no tall vehicles. Small outside very tight parking. The room and hallways were fine. Everything was clean. They use a smelly deodorizer in the rooms, so if you are chemical sensitive. forget it.  Up hill to the check in. Up hill to the rooms. Up hill to breakfast. The breakfast room is on the 2nd floor amd locked. You need a room key to get in. Why? By having the door closed all the time, it‚Äôs claustrophobic. I opened the door twice and the workers here closed it twice. Breakfast is so-so. Also, it gets stuffy inside the small breakfast room if the door is shut, lack of AC?. This isn‚Äôt the best Holiday Inn Express we
Manager Response: Dear Happytoberetired,  Thank you for taking the time in writing us a review. I'm sorry to hear that you had a few things go wrong during your stay. Thank you for your feedback about your stay and I can assure you that the issues have been addressed. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: The lobby was nice, the staff was ver helpful, the room was nice and clean, the breakfast was yummy. I would return to this location again if in the area. I would also recommend this location to others.
Manager Response: Dear Babyb9999,  Thank you for taking the time in writing us a review. I'm very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Check in was fast, hotel is clean, and the staff is very nice. What more could you ask for? Jesus helped me navigate to where I needed to be with ease. Whoever is in charge should definitely give Jesus a higher position. If I ever need a hotel in the area again, I would come here for sure!
Manager Response: Dear David B, We do appreciate your 5 star review and the awesome things you had to say about Jesus . Safe travels, R Dalgado

Summary: Amazing service all around from all staff. Hotel offers more amenities free of charge than I had the time to take advantage of. Definitely will utilize this location again when returning. Special thanks to Kevin for letting me check in early!
Manager Response: Hello zstruck2, We do appreciate you wonderful comments about the hotel and kevin. With gratitude. R Dalgado

Summary: Just wanted to say that jesus have me the best service i have ever received. Service with a smile super helpful and friendly. He made sure we were taken care of. Definitely will be back!! -David Corro
Manager Response: Dear davidcorro15, We do hope you had a lovely time at the wedding you attended. Thank you for mentioning Jesus by name and we do hope to see you again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and it did exactly what we needed. It was a clean hotel. Safe area. Kevin checked us in and was great. We showed up about an hour before check in time and he was able to get us a room. The room was cleaned up and restocked each day. The breakfast is nothing to speak of, but it was free so we had just enough to hold us over until we could get out for food...and free coffee is always a plus. The room had a decent size fridge and coffee as well. We drove to Bolsa Chica/Huntington beach every day (takes 20-30 minutes depending on stop lights) but was a third of the price of staying on the beach. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Allie H, Thank you for posting and mentioning Kevin by name. Through a new Holiday Inn Express initiative we will be renovating our entire breakfast experience in July and would love you to comeback to try it out. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: A clean, comfortable  hotel in Costa Mesa
Summary: My wife and I stayed here one night. We were visiting the area as tourists. The front desk staff was very helpful and friendly.  The parking is under the building. The room was airy and clean. There are no views to speak of.  The breakfast room was surprisingly small. We had to wait a while to get a seat. The food was the standard HI breakfast.
Manager Response: Hello Mazuza2,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review. Through a new Holiday Inn Express initiative we will be renovating our entire breakfast experience in July and would love you to comeback to try it out.  Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Kevin has all the abilities of a Manager, so to have him share his time as a front desk coinsurer is a true joy...        thank you, Kevin      and Happy Mothers Day to all you Mothers out there..... Sincerely   Mr. Croteau
Manager Response: Dear Gerald C, Thank you for recognizing Kevin and experiencing his hospitality. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Our concierge, Jesus, was extremely friendly and helpful - providing us with the customer service we have come to appreciate from Holiday Inns. The hotel and room was very clean and comfortable. Check in was simple and the fresh baled cookies were a surprising treat.
Manager Response: Dear kaitie9, That was very sweet of you to call out Jesus by name and mentioning the fresh baked cookie. We have been running the freshly baked cookie program for 4 months now, and were surprised that no one had mentioned them prior. Thank you, R Dalgado

Summary: Room was clean.  Bed was OK. Room was ready early. The below window heat/air was old and loud.  Only stayed one night to see a play.  It was adequate for one night. Staff was friendly.  Near highway.  Stairs to get to elevator but they do have a handicapped ramp they can put down.  Slow elevator.  Should lower price based on area.  Free cookies at night was nice.  We missed breakfast.
Manager Response: Hi GSKarzen,  Thank you for spending the night with us. I'm happy to welcome you with our cozy rooms, comfortable bed and the bonus of free snacks. This has always been our goal to provide and it feels great to have succeeded in these.   On the downside, I am sorry that you had felt uneasy with the air conditioning unit and the elevator functionality. I feel your concern as this may also have an impact on other guests. Thank you for bringing this up. I have informed our management team regarding your insights and will be carefully reviewed and implement changes for the better.   Again, thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us. I look forward to hosting you once again so you can enjoy our great breakfast.   Best regards,  Frank A. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: I used my Spire points to stay for two nights.  The customer service was the best I've experienced in a long time.  I was made to feel so welcome.  Everything was in order and clean.  It's a long skinny hotel, with real estate along Newport Boulevard / Highway 55 being prime space.  There is NO parking for a moving truck or large vehicles.  The parking lot dead ends and does not go around the hotel.  The breakfast room is on the second floor; the fitness room on the third floor.  The business center is in the lobby and very nicely appointed.  There is coffee 24/7 in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear fairgirl59, Thank you for being a Spire member and loyalty. We do appreciate the lovely comments that you posted and look forward to you coming back to visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Check-in was simple, room was clean, decent TV.  The staff was very friendly and helpful, especially Jesus.  He helped me with several recommendations in the area and was spot on with Amorelia!  The location is good, being near everything you could need.
Manager Response: Dear Richard U, Thank you very much for your review and for mentioning Jesus by name. He will be excite to see his name in print. We do hope to see you on your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: What's good? Large room. Washing machines: gym with machines & free weights; outdoor pool; free covered parking; free wifi; 1 L bottle of water supplied in room.  What's not? 4 cracked tiles on the bathroom floor; a hair on the bathroom floor; water only warm not hot. Selection of TV channels huge but not many movies and the largest number of religious channels I have seen in my life - slight imbalance? It is on the main road but I was tired enough that the traffic did not bother me though it was noticeable.
Manager Response: Dear Frank M, Thank you for your descriptive review and we are pleased that you had a lot of good items to point out. We appreciate the housekeeping items that you brought up and will look into it pronto. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Very clean hotel, employees are extremely friendly and helpful
Summary: We have stayed at many Holiday Inns, this was the first time at an Express. The staff greeted us very nicely, the grounds were immaculate, and the room was very clean and nice. I would recommend this hotel and we will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Lance E, We are pleased that your first stay at a Holiday Inn Express was lovely and that you found the hotel immaculate and the staff hospitable. We do hope you choose to stay with us on your future visits. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel is going through several improvements. Unfortunately some of the nights I was there it was making parking a nightmare. Jesus helped us find a spot to park and was just a genuinely nice person. The rooms were quiet even with the construction going on. Breakfast was great, always hot. I was given a late checkout which was more than appreciated. There was no coffee when I went down to the front so Andrew made a fresh pot which was more than appreciated. Definitely will be returning to see the improvement.
Manager Response: Dear Justin R, We are so glad you noticed our improvements to include new air conditioners, carpeting , bedding, doors, higher speed internet , to name a few. Sometime during next year the Holiday Inn Express brand, is going to go through a new Breakfast Experience" and hopefully we will be ready for your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I traveled here on business this past week. The hotel has a strange layout, but I was expecting that per the reviews on here. I arrived a bit early and was checked in by Andrew. I am beyond impressed with the service provided. All throughout the day I saw him in different parts of the hotel either assisting staff or running back to the desk to greet someone. I will be returning just for the service as I'm sure the layout will grow on me.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a small emergency on a business trip and needed my own room quick, and the folks here took great care of me! The room was clean, AC worked awesome, I even needed a big favor upon check out and Andrew at the front desk really went the extra mile to make sure my needs (and my longboard!) were taken care of. I am a creature of habit, so I will definitely be staying this location again soon. Thank you guys so much, and if you're reading this still, STAY HERE!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff - 5 Location - 4 Hotel - 5  Andrew checked me in. He was 100% professional and also fun/genuine. No canned message but just a real good person doing an outstanding job. This is the service that keeps me coming back.   The location is so close to everything there is to do. I ran to Balboa Island in the morning and could have gone to a concert in Irvine if I wanted to. It's not 5 stars only because it was not on the ocean, but it was very easy to find.   The hotel is new clean and it has a fun setup. I'll come back for sure. It's easy walking distance to many fun restaurants.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Have stayed at this hotel several times. The staff always makes you feel welcome. Rene is friendly, very accommodating and helped out a great deal. A pleasure to deal with. The hotel is clean and well kept.  It's our go to hotel when we travel to Costa Mesa!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a typical Holiday Inn Express, even if laid out a little interestingly level wise and functionally. For instance, breakfast is on the second floor. The parking is adequate. The underground garage is small and there is an elevator that one can take the lobby and one's room if one knows the garage access door combination which, upon checking in, one does not.  Breakfast starts at 6:30 which is not early enough for those of us who have to be out and about earlier. Most places, Holiday Inn Express included, start at 6 a.m. Some have even gone so far as to start at earlier hours. Would have been nice. There is a Denny's but it is about 6 miles away. There are the usual Ray of fast food places two, but they are also several miles out.  My room was clean, a decent size and the
Manager Response: Hi John V,  Thank you for posting a candid feedback from your recent stay with us. It is great to know that you were able to appreciate the cleanliness and condition of your room as well as the air conditioning among the others. However, I was concerned to see that you were not impressed with our underground parking and hallway cleanliness just to name a few. We always aim to provide an exceptional stay for all of our guests that is why I regret to see that you did not have a great experience. I would like to apologize for any inconvenience these issues may have caused you during your stay. Rest assured, your comments will be shared with our management team to properly address your concerns.   Again, thank you for the review and for staying with us. I hope that we would have another chance to accommodate you again in the future.    Regards,    Mike F.  Case Manager  IHGService

Summary: Friendly staff, clean room, amazing bed, quiet and calm....everything I needed! Wish there were a few more things to do in the immediate vicinity but hardly anything to fault the hotel on! Will be back in March with the whole family!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The locations is just far enough away to be easy to get to and from. Not too far not too close. The hotel is very clean and modern. Breakfast was pretty basic. Stop with the weird pre-made omlettes, downright scary. Check your garbage and you'll see most of them ended up there. I have on gripe with all these places. People go there on vacation, mostly with kids. What parent is able to get them up and seated by 9am cutoff. If it's to save money, think again. Most parents end up taking a bit of everything and bringing it to the room where most of it ends up in landfill. Just leave the place open till noon.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Andrew, Leisha make this hotel !!! Their customer service is amazing. From the minute you check in Andrew takes care of all your needs. The kitchen staff is amazing and friendly. Andrew is the face of customer service!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here with our wedding party.  Meggan the sales manager was amazing!!  She gave exceptional service to my wife and I.  She helped us work out a price and had her team there to wish us well on our wedding day.  This service will not only bring me back to costa mesa, but will keep me as a holiday inn customer everywhere.  I want to thank meggan and her team at costa mesa for the fantastic job they did!!!
Manager Response: Dear lexiriley, Thank you so very much for your post and for singling out Meggan. Congratulations on your wedding and we are glad that we may see you again in Costa Mesa. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This property was situated right off HWY 55 for an easy on and off. The property was clean and the staff was very personable. Upon Check-In, I was greeted by Rene. He made check-in very easy and was helpful with the questions I asked. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Genyl B Thank you very much for your post and a 5 star review. Rene will be excited to see his name in print. We look forward to your next visit Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The Holiday Inn Express Costa Mesa is clean, quiet, good amenities (Keurigs in room, frig, microwave, pool, etc.), convenient to Newport Beach, and has an excellent staff.  Would definitely stay here again for the price.
Manager Response: Dear NomadDad, Thank you for a lovely review and for noticing and writing about our Keurig machines. Happy fathers day in advance. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Simple in decor, furnishings and layout, the Holiday Inn is a good base for business in Costa Mesa or pleasure in nearby Newport Beach. Midway between John Wayne Airport and Newport Beach, it's well located although not much going on in the immediate neighborhood. You'll need a car to get around but there's free underground parking. Rooms are simple, clean, and comfortable. The new beds are a bit on the soft side. There's a bare bones fitness room and tiny outdoor pool. Self serve free breakfast is ample with eggs, breakfast meat, pancakes, and sinfully delicious cinnamon rolls. Friendly and helpful staff make for a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear gwwyjjliu, Thank you so much for a detailed recount of our hotel and services. We do have new mattresses, air conditioners and carpet in all our guest rooms. Our brand standard Cinnamon Rolls are a big hit with our guests. We hope to see you on your next visit to the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Booked short notice business trip with 2 night stay at this hotel. Arrived early but staff made extra effort to get a room ready for an early check in. Room, and breakfast area were clean. Jesus was very helpful when I arrived, as was the other gentleman working the desk in the daytime. Night time desk staff equally professional. Only down side is lack of a public seating area, the breakfast room is locked through the day. The only public work space is a medium size conference table very near the front desk, but the  staff happily accommodated my numerous meetings at the table through my stay. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Dan R, Thank you for the 5 star review. We are ecstatic that you had a wonderful stay and we are looking forward to seeing you again in the near future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great Staff and Place to Stay
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel about three nights per week for the past six months. The accommodations are great and the hotel is located in a good location for business travelers. I have had the opportunity to interact with several of the staff and all are always very friendly and helpful. Cliff who is the night manager always exceeds my expectations and gets me efficiently registered upon my often late night arrivals. Lorena who manages the breakfast area is always smiling and making sure all guests have exactly what they need, she also keeps the breakfast room spotless. These two great employees make my many days and nights away from home very pleasant and represent this hotel well with their outstanding service.
Manager Response: Dear Rjbse, We do thank you for your business and continued support. We also thank you for the shout out to Lorena and Cliff. They will be thrilled to see their name in print. Safe travels and we do look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed here with my mum prior to running the OC half marathon. This was one of the host hotels for the event. We had a great stay; there's lots of parks nearby to explore - we highly recommend visiting the upper Newport Bay Nature Reserve (bring running shoes).   The beds at the hotel were comfortable and new - it looks like the hotel has recently had a facelift so it is clean and inexpensive - a perfect spot to rest your head. Breakfast is your standard American breakfast (although the egg omelettes were delicious)! Juan who works in the breakfast area was super friendly and helpful, as was the front desk clerk on our check in night (May 5) - she really went above and beyond to give us a nice room and explain everything to us. :)  Thanks, HI!
Manager Response: Dear Sarah L, Thank you so much for the wonderful comments and listing some local attractions. Yes we recently did some renovations to include all new air conditioners, new matresses, new guest room carpets and a renewed front desk area. I am glad you enjoyed your breakfast and that Donette was able to take care of you. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great staff, great location
Summary: I booked this hotel around midnight the night before our trip to Cali because the reviews and price were so great.  They were correct! The staff is all awesome. Jesus was just as great as all the reviews stated! All other staff were great too! I love that our standard room had a counter space with sink, fridge, coffee maker, cabinet space, and a microwave! The rooms are a good size as well.  The location is great.  We hit Laguna Beach and found great spots! (down from Diamond Street is so beautiful!!) Close to Newport/Balboa.  There are local restaurants near just down the road like Yard House, True Food, Baja Fresh plus many more.  Getting onto the freeway is cake! There's a grocery store just down the road and a liquor store too.  Will stay here again when in Cali.  Oh!
Manager Response: Dear Kiffany R, Thank you for your enthusiastic and lovely review. Your review does characterize our hotel and proximity to all the happening places in Costa Mesa. Aprreciate the shout out to Jesus and the "FREE" parking statement. We do look forward to having you as our guest again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Jesus the receptionist is by far the best! Treats you like family! I would recommend this hotel! (: The hotel is super clean & they leave you an extra towel for emergencies! I'll be coming back for a trip here again!
Manager Response: Dear Ray D, We do thank you for the 5 star review and for mentioning Jesus. He will be thrilled when he sees his name in print. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Pleasantly surprised! Also, Jesus at desk was awesome!
Summary: I had a very nice stay at this property. The layout and design is a bit funky/non traditional, but they make it work for the space that they have. I stayed here November of 2016 -- there was some construction goii on .. but it was fine. Jesus at the desk was wonderful, accommodating .... a pleasure to deal with. The lobby (small) appeared to be newly renovated. There was a convenient parking garage under the hotel. The a/c-heat unit wired well. There was large mini fridge with freezer compartment and micro in my room. The continental breakfast area was in the second floor. Again ... they made the best use of the space that they had to work wtih. There was no smell in my room. I would stay here again! : -)
Manager Response: Dear Eulalia_3, Thank you for noticing all our changes especially since we have all new air conditioners, new mattresses, new carpets and a renovated front desk. We do look forward to your continued stays with us and thank you for mentioning Jesus by name. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a great location.
Summary: This was my first time in Costa Mesa. It's a great little city. Everyone met was super friendly.  As usual Holiday Inn delivers a nice place. This is a nicely updated hotel and is a great little place to stay. It's not a big location, but it is quaint and clean.  Big rooms and a nice n' roomy stand up shower. The pool is small but a comfy place to relax.  The hotel is about .5 miles from the Triangle, which is a small city center. There is shopping and good restaurants like Yard House. Pleanty of places to walk to. Starbucks and JUJU (a juice bar) are about 1 mile away.   I would definitely stay here the next time in Costa Mesa.  Happy travels.
Manager Response: Dear Gary M, We are so glad that you enjoed the City of Costa Mesa and the hotel. Do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Helped us with a website double billing problem right away. Room and skill outdoor pool very well maintained. Juan very helpful for weekend breakfast. Would stay here again. Parking was right but free which saved us a lot compared to neighbouring hotels.
Manager Response: Dear local1323, We do appreciate you taking the time to write this review and for mentioning Juan by name. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel is in a very convenient location to my office and to great restaurants. The staff is very friendly, rooms are clean and includes breakfast everyday.  I would recommend the hotel to anyone.  There is covered parking as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The only problem I had here was the ability to hear people in the other rooms, both above and beside me. The walls seemed paper thin and I couldn't understand how with carpeted floors, the noise above was so loud. Maybe suggest the top floor! That was a bit of a bother, but it is a nice hotel with a nice staff and covered parking. üòÄ
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had an awesome experience from start to finish.  The staff is extremely pleasant and Andrew at the front desk was very helpful and had a fantastic attitude.  I will definitely book this place again when I'm back in the area!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I use the Holiday Inn Express hotels for my business travel, and I found this property one step up from some other HIE's.  The staff I encountered were polite and professional.  The property is well maintained and very clean.  My room was in great condition.  The breakfast was the standard HIE breakfast.  The gym was adequate.  The outdoor pool size was appropriate for the size of hotel (and very clean).  The pool towels were real pool towels. I am very happy that I stayed at this property.
Manager Response: Dear wbsAlberta, Thank you for such a detailed and wonderful post. We do appreciate all your comments and are very glad that you had a great stay. Do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: I wanted to be disappointed, but couldn't be
Summary: As I pulled up to the hotel and parked in the small underground garage, I was thinking, "Uh Oh... What did I just get myself into?"  The neighborhood is spotty, and as I walked up to the small lobby, it was clear that this is a much older hotel.  I was preparing myself for the worst.  Here's the thing - It would be very hard to find fault with this hotel.  Nothing blew me away with grandeur or spectacular-ness, but the staff was VERY friendly, everything was spotlessly clean and smelled good, the bed was very comfortable, and everything worked.  The exercise room (Third floor) had the essentials, and the equipment was anything but high end, but again, EVERYTHING WORKED.  This was a nice departure from my night before at another hotel, where the gym equipment was much higher end,
Manager Response: Dear NelPit, Thank you for your detailed review. We loved reading your approach to your stay and ecstatic to know that everything worked well to your satisfaction and you enjoyed our staff. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Nice and clean hotel at a decent price
Summary: All in all I had a nice stay.  My room was nice and clean and actually smelled good when I checked in.  The location worked out well for me as I was able to walk to some good spots to eat in the area and I enjoyed running through some of the neighborhoods behind the hotel.  My only areas of concern were that the nightstand drawer would open by itself and I ended up hitting it one time when getting out of bed and the "office" chair they put in the room was extremely uncomfortable and provided no support.  The breakfast that was included was nice as well, I enjoyed the fact they had gravy both mornings and the eggs were cooked well both times.  All in all it was a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear David D,   Thank you for choosing to stay at the hotel and for taking the time to write your review. I am delighted to read that you were satisfied with the beautiful and neat rooms, convenient location and complimentary breakfast items. Our hotel is committed to providing our guests with the highest quality services and facilities. Your concerns regarding the nightstand drawer and work chair in your room will be forwarded to the onsite management. I am confident they will take necessary actions to address these issues as soon as possible. Nevertheless, I apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. If there is anything we can do to make your next stay more comfortable, please do not hesitate to let us know.  Once again, thank you for staying with us.  Sincerely,     Lera  Case Manager   IHGService

Summary: We started our vacation staying at this hotel because of the location to our family reunion and Disneyland. It was a nice hotel- very quiet and clean. There was some construction/painting going on during our visit but it wasn't disruptive like often times. The only complaint is that i think the maid may have pushed a button on the TV that caused it to come on while we were out. It was kind of scary to come back to our room rather late at night and hear the loud TV coming from our room- then it came back on at 4 am while we were sleeping. Other than that we enjoyed our 3 nights here.
Manager Response: Dear RrosesWA, Hope you had a lovely time at Disneyland and gad you enjoyed your breakfast and stay at the hotel. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Neighborhood may not be ideal, but the breakfast is good one.
Summary: I arrived in the night, and was surprised to open curtain seeing all small houses/trailers surrounding in the morning. No way I can take a walk around the hotel. The breakfast is pretty good, varies of  yogurts and fruit, egg, sausage, muffin, biscuit. For me it is just one night stay.
Manager Response: Dear Ann H, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are glad that you enjoyed the breakfast. Do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed in back in early November 2016. Rooms were a good size, and nice & clean. The only down side was that toilet wasn't flushing correctly. The location was great since it was close to triangle plaza.
Manager Response: Dear ceniceroschavelly, Thank you so much for mentioning our spacious and clean rooms. We do appreciate you telling us about the toilet as we will have out engineering staff look at it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel is very clean. From the lobby to the rooms you could really see they maintain the upkeep. Rooms are pretty spacious and include a fridge and microwave. They even have a keurig! The staff is incredibly friendly. When checking in Jesus was very knowledgeable in helping with recommendations. Upon checkout I was looking for somewhere to go before I went home and Andrew who with some last minute places to visit by the beach.
Manager Response: Dear hd_578, Thank you for your 5 star review and recognizing our staff by name.Andrew and Jesus will be thrilled to see their names mentioned on your review. Much gratitude. R Dalgado

Summary: Larger than average rooms with spacious bathrooms. Clean rooms. Comfortable bed. Staff was helpful and always had a smile on their faces. Convenient location. I was a short drive from the airport, Newport Beach and South Coast Plaza. Enjoyed the complimentary breakfast. Wi fi was fantastic, which was helpful as I was here on business. Great choice compared to the other questionable options nearby.
Manager Response: Dear c8615, We thank you for your awesome review and noticing the details. Thank you for taking the time to write the review. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary: Hotel was nice and clean. Jesus the desk clerk was exceptional, friendly, cordial and  very helpful.  Room was  big enough for sure.  Breakfast had a lot of different things, so was great.  Only negative was the room above had a little kid or two running back and forth.  We'd go again, but ask for a 3rd floor room.
Manager Response: Dear Philip A, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and for acknowledging Jesus by name. He will be thrilled to see his name in print. We do look forward to you next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: All expected amenities (despite construction issues) received.
Summary: H I Express has become our favorite hotel chain because we always (including this trip) receive those amenities we've learned to expect. This, even though the whole first floor was under going renovation and a pipe broke, causing the water to be shut off.
Manager Response: Dear Renny R, Thank you for stating that HI Express is your favorite chain. Renovations are now complete and the hotel is ready for your next trip. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Your safety is not their top priority!!!
Summary: As at many hotels, there are doors that are supposed to remain locked and only opened with a room key.  At this Holiday inn express, these doors are not locked any ANYONE can just walk in at any time.  My room being right next to this door made me very concerned for my safety.  I told the front desk and they did nothing about it.  The door remained open to anyone all night long.  If safety is your concern, there are many other hotels in the area to stay at.
Manager Response: Dear blueybluey, Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We have one main entrance where we have our front desk staff positioned. All our other entry doors are locked an secured and need a guest key card to enter. Our guests have always had a feeling of safety when staying with us. I would be more than happy to talk to you about your particular experience and can be reached at 9496568700. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel is clean, comfortable, good beds and accommodating staff. Breakfast was delicious, with a variety of choices. The location of the amenities is typed on a sticker on the folder of the key card. However, I did have to ask the location of the exercise room and the ice machine. The information on the key card holder can't be found anywhere else. The rooms were clean and simple but had all we needed.
Manager Response: Dear Deborah G, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are pleased that you found the hotel clean, good beds and the breakfast good.  In September we put new mattresses and new carpet in all our rooms and are glad you were able to experience it. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Staff at the hotel were extremely friendly and helpful. The rooms were nice, comfortable, and most importantly clean. The hotel was located in a good area for our traveling purposes--OC Fair and Expo center and dinner. Breakfast was also good.
Manager Response: Dear jackiesue0809, We do thank you for your review and for giving us a shout out for "cleanliness"  We look forward to you visiting us in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Fantastic Staff! Clean large rooms, friendly atmosphere.
Summary: We enjoyed The Holliday Inn Express Costa Mesa, the front desk staff, Carmen made sure our breakfast was ready and very tasty! Our room was large and clean. Parking was easy and free, wifi was good, in all we were very happy.
Manager Response: Dear randygi, Thank you for the 5 star review and singling out your breakfast host Carmen. It will make her day when we show her your review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Arrived late but room was ready and clean. Hotel convenient location to beach and several Orange County attractions. Room deodorizer used by housecleaning staff was a bit odd smelling but was easily dispersed when air conditioning was used. Accidentally left behind a phone charger in the room on departure but hotel staff unable to locate. Not sure who really has it now. Breakfast staff was helpful (Carmen). Would recommend that hotel management provide newspapers for use by guests in breakfast area.
Manager Response: Dear Bruce C, Thank you for taking the tome to write this review and for recognizing Carmen during your breakfast experience. Please let me know your room number/confirmation and type of charger, and we will look for it. The hotel manager Nancy Rosales can be reached at 9496316000. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I was here on business to complete a few training sessions with my company. The free breakfast, gym, and being only 5 minutes away from my work made everything very convenient. I was greeted everyday before and after work by a staff member named Michael. His service was very friendly and genuine and very much appreciated. I look forward to staying at this location again.
Manager Response: Dear jenkris23, Thank you so very much for acknowledging Michael and the hospitality he provided. We do look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: My girlfriend and I had nothing short of a great experience here at the Holiday Inn Express. Our stay was made all the better with the sensational service of the front desk staff. Specifically, Michael and Tyler. They were both helpful and accommodating to a high degree. If I ever find myself coming back to this area, I will surely choose to stay here again. Thanks all!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This HI-Express is completely renovated in the lobby and hallways.  They have free underground parking, free wifi, free breakfast, and Michael at the front desk is friendly and helpful.  The rooms are clean and large and have plugs near the bed and on the desk for all my chargers.  If you're the type of person who needs to sleep in complete silence, this HI-Express is near enough a major road that you may hear traffic, so I wouldn't recommend it.  I love the location because I can walk to the Yard House or Skosh Monahans for a beer and a meal.  I also love the proximity to the other city attractions and access to the I-405 and I-5 highways.  I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We hold our quarterly meetings at this hotel. The staff is friendly and accommodating and the hotel is tidy. The rooms are clean and comfortable and house a refrigerator, microwave, and Keurig machine. The location is a bit funky but there are plenty of places to shop and eat nearby.  Underground parking is free and easily accessible.  For our needs, the meeting room is not in an ideal location. It sits on the third floor next to and adjacent to guest rooms. At times, we heard guests talking and doors opening and closing to guest rooms, along with children running up and down the halls, so these were a distraction, even with the meeting room door closed.  The nearest restroom is on the lobby floor, so it was a bit inconvenient at times. The hotel offers a complimentary
Manager Response: Dear hippiechicklette, Thank you for taking the time to write an extensive review and we do appreciate your business. As you did mention, we do have a unique location, and are pleased you did like the parking and the breakfast. For your future meetings we can place your guest room on the 3rd floor, closer to the meeting room. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed here after a trip to OC Fair, it is parellel to the 55fwy kind of a strange location. Check in was smooth, our room was on 1st flr. The hotel was filled up with a girls softball team so there were a lot of kids running around. Our room was clean, seemed a little older furniture but worked. There was a flat screen, a sink, kuerig machine, microwave and small fridge. We had a couch and desk in room. Parking is real tight. There is an underground parking but if you have a big truck like us you have to park next to building, very tight area. There is a pool, looked nice. There is free breakfast but missed it, was only til 930 am on weekends. Check out is at noon which was nice.  Staff was pleasant. Over all good stay, nothing special. Did not find a lot of eating places
Manager Response: Dear Lela429, Thank you so very much for a detailed review of our hotel. We do appreciate the time you took and look and forward to you visiting us in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: awesome room, very nice beds, great breakfast, but could use more than one ice machine on property, a/c was awesome, but drowned out the sound of TV when on high, due to volume control on their TV's, staff was very helpful, and polite...
Manager Response: Dear kblaylock, We do thank you for choosing to sty at our hotel and for the effort put into writing your review. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: We stayed here for a quick, one night transition to another locale. We had a room with two queen beds. The room was large and spacious, had a tv, coffee machine, microwave and fridge. The beds and pillows were very comfortable. No shampoo in the bathroom, but bathroom was clean. Shower head nice, but no volume control. I wish CA hotels offered more water saving features, other than having to turn off the water. Breakfast was average, but nice that it is included. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent staff, clean and comfortable rooms and facilities
Summary: I had a great stay here, and I especially want to recognize front desk attendant Jesse. I arrived having just discovered a small problem with my reservation owing to a glitch in the online reservations system. As I was explaining the problem to Jesse, another guest came up to the desk to let him know the elevator wasn't working, and then, not three minutes later, yet another guest came up to let him know about a flooding problem in the parking garage. Jesse was extremely empathetic and professional. He got to work on all three problems immediately and had them all resolved in less than 24 hours. He also very helpfully made change for me a little later during my stay. The housekeeping staff also did an excellent job. The three women I interacted with were all very friendly, and
Manager Response: Dear dlfg63, Thank you so very much for giving a shout out to Jesse from our team and the nice things you had to say about our hotel.  Much gratitude. R Dalgado

Summary: Tyler in the front office could not have been any more nice or helpful. The place was clean they let us have early check in. We will definitely stay here again! The pool was great and so was the breakfast! I want to write a good review for this place but it's making me use 200 characters so we like this place very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very much
Manager Response: Dear Clint F, Thank you for your glowing review and your mention if Tyler. also love the fact that you were able to utilize the 200 characters appropriately!!! Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I know isn't a "5 star" hotel with room service and a concierge, but the service is excellent and the rooms are immaculate.  We have stayed there over 20 times in the last decade and they have always been great.  I would recommend a room with a soaking tub, so relaxing!
Manager Response: Dear happyk8e, We are so glad that you were able to enjoy your stay and utilize the tub. Thank you for your continued support and the many visits to our hotel. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: For the Quick bur Quiet Get Away
Summary: Upon entering the Lobby we were greeted with a smile from Hotel Attendant Jesse. He was very friendly. We asked a few questions and he graciously answered all of them. Even though the hotel is small but it provides access for all special needs. For our purposes it was centrally located, we came to enjoy the Newport Jazz Festival and shopping at South Coast Plaza. It provided a free but delicious breakfast. Rooms very clean and the breakfast area even though small was well set up and the attendant keep it very orderly. We would stay at the location again.
Manager Response: Dear othellab2016, Thank you for taking the time to write a nice review and also for giving a shout out to Jesse. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: My wife and I frequently go to Costa Mesa to visit our son who attends chapman u.
Summary: This was our first time staying at this Holiday Inn Express, and we loved everything they had to offer: a quiet room in the back, easy access to all freeways that we needed, 15 minutes to the beach, clean rooms with frig and micro, onsite free covered parking, etc. We checked out and were back in Sacramento when I got a call from the hotel staff asking me if I had left my iPad and a shirt in my room, which I had, sadly. I thanked them and offered a gratuity for the associate who had found these items and offered to pay for shipping them to me. I received my "lost" items in two days, at no charge. This level of integrity and service is very rare indeed, and we travel a fair bit, including internationally. Very heartwarming, we will not stay elsewhere when visiting my son (another
Manager Response: Dear Tarika53, Than you for your glowing review, We are gad we were able to retreieve your belongings and were able to get them back to you. We do look forward to your next visit when in this area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Very much enjoyed our stay and especially the breakfast service.  Maria Sanchez does a great job and making sure the breakfast is tasty and fresh.  The hotel was clean and pleasant.  Beds are comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear lkh4, Thank you for your lovely comments and for your mention of Maria. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This is a recent update Holiday Inn hotel, if you need a overnight near Los Angeles, It is also a good place, to a day trip out of sight seeing Los Angeles or the coast area. The staff is very friendly at the check in and there is parking garage under the property and around the place. We did stay at 3e floor at a nice and clean new updated 2 queens room (525), the property have no restaurant around but there are many restaurants in the area so we did eat at a Outback one mile away, there is free internet for IHG members, so we think good value/prize.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We recently stayed here for a conference and had a great stay. The room was clean and spacious. Beds were comfy and the bathroom was clean and nice. There was a large variety for breakfast and it was relatively tasty. The only complaint is the small availability of parking spaces. We had 16 people in our group and thankfully took 3 vehicles. If we had taken any more than that there wouldn't have been sufficient parking.   Other than that, it was wonderful! We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Jaymie G, Thank you so much for staying with us and for all the lovely comments. With 62 rooms and being close to the beach and airport, parking is sufficient and I am glad it worked out for you. We do look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Holiday Inn Express, Costa Mesa...a great place to stay in the area of Newport Beach
Summary: We very much enjoy our visits at the Holiday Inn Express, Costa Mesa. The hotel is clean, quiet, and receptive to requests for room location. Love the breakfast selection, and also very much appreciate the homemade cookies each evening. Also very much appreciated the friendliness of the staff, including Lourdes who always seemed to be smiling and wanting to help everyone she met.
Manager Response: Dear Karen E, Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review and we do appreciate you recognizing Lourdes our housekeeper. We will share your note with the team for all to see. Thanks again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: This is always a great place to stay
Summary: we stay here every time we come to costa mesa. The hotel is very nice, quiet, and near a lot of things.  There is a mall with restaurants just down the street, Newport pier is not that far away, just a great location.   The staff is always friendly and helpful.  Check in always go smooth, and house keeping is great.  This trip we had Lourdes as our house keeper, and she was great.  Always ready to help when needed.
Manager Response: Hello Leahtots, Thank you so very much for your wonderful review. We especially want to say thank you for singling out Lourdes, as she and her team will be ecstatic to see their name in print. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I always stay in this hotel when im around the area, which means im in this hotel every month due to work.  First and foremost i would to commend the staff from morning to evening shift  (Tyler, Jesse & Donnette) they are all very special, professional and friendly. They are the corpse of the success of the hotel. They always say, In every success of a company there are great people behind it. They are really very attentive to your needs. They brings stuff to your room without complain.   Housekeepers are all friendly and helpful.  You will feel at home and safe in this hotel. The rooms are clean and very conducive to sleep. The bed and pillows are perfect. I love their shower head it gives you that massage feeling when you adjust it to a certain level. breakfast is free. They
Manager Response: Dear L W, Firstly thank you so very much for being a loyal guest and for all the lovely things you had to say about the hotel and services. You could not have said it better, with Tyler, Jesse and Donette being the back bone of the hotel. We do look forward to serving you on your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Close to everything...Beach, Freeway access, movie theater, shops, etc. Parking was so full people were parking in areas that weren't marked as spaces. Stairs at many of the entrances so not easy to get to the elevator. But, room was clean. Person above us wasn't very quiet but that isn't the fault of the motel.
Manager Response: Dear lew w, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are sorry that the person above you was not quiet. Please feel free to reach out to our front desk staff in the future, as they will be more than happy to call the guest above you and have them be more considerate to you and your stay. We look forward to your next visit with us. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: During our stay, we had a pleasant experience, in particular we were delighted with Efren, our breakfast host. Every item on the menu was fully stocked - always!  He also made sure the breakfast room was clean and appealing. Thanks, Efren - great job!  Bill Jensen
Manager Response: Dear Jeff W, Thank you for your 5 star review and for mentioning Efren. We are all so pleased that you personally recognized him as he does do a marvelous job of keeping his breakfast items stocked, the area clean and his guests happy. Gratitude for noticing. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Quality hotel with comfortable rooms, a responsive and caring staff, and reasonable prices. Includes complimentary breakfast with awesome pancake machine and all of the essential amenities.  Not much more you could ask for in a hotel of this tier.
Manager Response: Hi tdevo217!  Thanks for your awesome review! I appreciate you taking the time to let us know how your experience was! I hope we get to see you both again real soon, it was a pleasure having you! -T.Haidet General Manager

Summary: I stay here anytime I'm in the area. At least 1-2 times a year. The font desk staff is always friendly and helpful.  Over the years there have been many refreshing renovations.  The beds are comfortable, and the rooms are spacious. They offer free Wi-Fi, which is becoming a rarity in hotels these days. The hotel offers breakfast, with all the standard food items, such as muffins, cereal, eggs, juice, coffee, tea, etc. I would recommend staying at this hotel, because it's close to near by attractions, most being about 15-30 mins away. The beach is literally just down the road. Restaurants, and shopping a plenty nearby as well.
Manager Response: Hi Butterflyin A! Thank you SO much for taking the time to write a review!! I'm so thrilled to hear that you enjoy coming back to our property year after year! We do we best to keep updating and upgrading our amenities so I'm glad you noticed! My staff and I look forward to seeing you again this year! Thanks again! -T.Haidet General Manager

Summary: A hotel with reasonable prices, but average services. I had to to business for a few weeks and I should have considered the lack of a laundry service and a restaurant.  Anyway, you can use the onsite laundry, when it works, and order food for delivery.
Manager Response: Hi Simone Z,   Thank you for taking the time to review our property! We appreciate you choosing our hotel for your business trip and hope you'll come back to see us again soon! -T.Haidet

Summary: My guess would be that this is either a hotel that was renovated or they had an odd piece of land onto which to place it so the lay out is just different.  The lobby is the lobby.  It's wheelchair accessible to the elevators with the use of a wheelchair list, meaning other will have to carry their bags up a few stairs.  The breakfast room is on the second floor.  There are several turns off the elevator to get to the main hall.  (They do need to not block open the fire doors even though it makes it easier to navigate the labyrinth.)  All this said, the room was fine except for the fact that the windows were single pane so the noise from the service road and highway was significant.  I slept well and the rooms are clean.
Manager Response: Greetings EnjoyTravelAlways,  Thank you for taking the time to submit a review! We appreciate your feedback and Thank You for choosing to stay with us. You are correct, our hotel went through a major renovation 2 years ago to improve and add to the original layout of the hotel.  Thanks again for staying with us and we hope to see you again! -T.Haidet General Manager

Summary Heading: Good hotel with great customer service
Summary: I stayed here for one night and it was quite a nice place. The front desk people were very friendly and very helpful with giving me places to eat that are near as well as directions. They also got me a taxi to show up when I needed it and very fast with room requests. The room itself was very nice and I was surprised at how nice it actually was. The only downside to this hotel for me was that I could hear the next room very clearly but I was really only there a little while as I was out most of the time. They do not have shuttles to the airport either so be aware of that as a taxi van cost me $17 to get there. Over all a good place to stay with plenty of places to eat as well as clubs near by.
Manager Response: Hello BigRu510! I appreciate you taking the time to review us on your recent stay! I'm so thrilled to hear your stay was so positive that our property and staff made you feel comfortable and taken care of. I'm so proud of the staff we have and love to hear when our guests have great things to say about them! I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future.  Take care,  Thomas H. General Manager

Summary: My girlfriends and I always choose to stay at this Holiday Inn when we need a "staycation". The proximity to the beach, nightlife and shops is perfect without the expensive price of a resort hotel. The property is small, but offers great amenities, service and is modern and clean. In addition, my mom had left her shoe in our hotel room, Thomas, the general manager, personally contacted me to address the issue. Thomas' care and effort made me feel valued as a customer and heard; for that alone I will be back to this property! Great place, great value, great staff and a great location. I give it 5 stars.
Manager Response: Hi nani432796! THANK YOU so much for posting this! I'm SO glad you and your girlfriends choose to stay with us that you enjoy yourselves! I greatly appreciate your comments and I look forward to see y'all again soon! HAPPY NEW YEAR! -T.Haidet General Manager

Summary: Overall the stay was good. Checkin was quick. Breakfast area was really full at around 8 am, sitting area was small. Hotel is next to freeway. Nearby are plenty of stores and restaurants. Hotel is not that far away from Newport Beach area. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Greetings Copper07! Happy Holidays! Thanks so much for submitting a review! I'm pleased to hear you had a positive experience and that you'd stay with us again! We look forward to it! Happy New Year!! -T.Haidet General Manager

Summary Heading: Ok, but not the best choice in the area
Summary: Stayed here on business in Costa Mesa.   This hotel was ok, but a little less than what I typically have come to expect in HI Express.    Pros:   - I had a room in the inner part of the hotel, so it was fairly quiet;  - Clean, comfortable room;   Cons:   - Not a good location...on an access road right on the freeway, in a questionable neighborhood;  - Small, compact lobby without the typical breakfast buffet layout;
Manager Response: Season's Greetings Marion G,  Thank you for taking the time to submit a review on your experience with us! I'm sorry to hear though that we did not meet your expectations. Are area is actually quite safe and well lit. Our property is monitored and patrolled to keep our guests secure and comfortable!  I do thank you for choosing to stay with us, as I know you have many choices these days! I hope we have the privilege of welcoming you back in the future! -T.Haidet

Summary Heading: This is not a great place!
Summary: First, the hotel is obviously a converted Quality Inn or Motel 6. The layout is horrible. First you can't park your car and check in, theres no space for you car. Good luck finding it because it's on the second floor tucked away. If you want to workout, again its in a small former room and its on the third floor. Thanks everyone,

These are the features that I like best:  The Holiday Inn Express is centrally located and there are many nice restaurants and businesses close by.  The hotel is fabulous and very reasonably priced. Because we are members of the IHG rewards club, upon our check-in to the hotel, we received a welcome gift bag with trail mix and a bottle of water!  The rooms are clean, comfortable, very accommodating with refrigerator and microwave, coffee maker, disposable plates, cups and plastic ware for your convenience. Manager Response: Hi Pamela!! Thank you again for your kind words!!! We thank you for choosing to stay with us year after year! I means the world to us! I hope you enjoy the holidays! -T.Haidet General Manager

Manager Response: Hi zainab m,   Thank you for your awesome comments!!! I'm thrilled to hear you had such a pleasant time staying at our property! My staff and I wish you the best and hope we get the chance to welcome you back soon! -T.Haidet General Manager

Summary Heading: Good place to stay close the beach
Summary: This is a pretty good hotel that meets what you expect in a Holiday Inn Express with a clean and comfortable room. It is right on the 55, near where that freeway ends. You'll hear a bit of traffic noise, but that's to be expected just about anywhere in greater Los Angeles. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful, including point me toward a local restaurant that was easy walking distance to avoid any more driving and parking. The hotel is about 3 miles from the coast and popular beach locations. There is a lot of noise that travels from one room to the next (I listened my neighbor's TV for most of the evening).
Manager Response: Greetings ColeQ,   Thanks so much for selecting our hotel for your stay! I'm truely appreciative and am pleased to hear you had such a positive experience! You are right, there can be some traffic noise in some rooms but we'll do whatever we can to ensure you have a nice quiet night! I hope we see you again real soon! -T.Haidet General Manager

Summary Heading: Good place to lay your head
Summary: We stayed here after a long, full day on Catalina. We live 1.5 hours away and didn't want to drive home after a 14 hour day. This Hotel was clean and very comfortable. The price was right and only 4 miles away from the Catalina Flyer. The free breakfast was average and well stocked. The coffee and juice was good also. The dining room has plenty of space for guests. Overall this Hotel was very good and we will definitely bookmark for future trips.
Manager Response: Hi AngieandJoe!  Wow!! Thank you so much for your kind words!!! We certainly appreciate you taking the time to write a review!! Can't wait to welcome you guys back soon!!! -T.Haidet General Manager

Summary Heading: One night stay on a business trip.

I used the Work Out Room there and it was well equipped and clean. One thing that impressed me was the cleanliness of the entire facility. It looked new. Parking in the underground garage was easy, and I felt that my truck was safe there. I'll be back.
Manager Response: Hello 224abc!  Thank you for choosing to stay with for your one night in Costa Mesa! Summary Heading: On our way to Catalina Island

This hotel has been recently remodeled and is clean and proper.  The restaurant offers food food as reasonable rates. Best of all they have more parking then the other properties so you will not be driving in circles looking for a place to park after 6pm.

Parking may be tight if the hotel is full and offers limited parking outside and a parking garage under the hotel - Parking is FREE which some similar hotels in the area charge for.
